org.corfudb.universe.node.server

Interface CorfuServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<CorfuServer>, Node
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCorfuServer, DockerCorfuServer, VmCorfuServer

    public interface CorfuServer
extends Node, Comparable<CorfuServer>
    Represent a Corfu server implementation of Node used in the Universe.

        Description copied from interface: Node

        Specified by:

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Symmetrically disconnect a CorfuServer from the cluster, which creates a complete partition.
        Throws:
        NodeException - thrown in case of unsuccessful disconnect.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(List<CorfuServer> servers)
        Symmetrically disconnect a CorfuServer from a list of other servers, which creates a partial partition.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of servers to disconnect from
        Throws:
        NodeException - thrown in case of unsuccessful disconnect.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pause a CorfuServer
        Throws:
        NodeException - thrown in case of unsuccessful pause.

      • restart

        void restart()
        Restart a CorfuServer
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be restarted

      • start

        void start()
        Start a CorfuServer
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be started

      • reconnect

        void reconnect()
        Reconnect a CorfuServer to the cluster
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be reconnected

      • reconnect

        void reconnect(List<CorfuServer> servers)
        Reconnect a CorfuServer to the list of servers
        Parameters:
        servers - List of servers to reconnect.
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be reconnected

        Resume a CorfuServer
